main event: A civilian from a vessel reported observing a very large balloon, moving against the wind with white smoke underneath, before it disappeared into the clouds.
interesting points: The observation was of a single unidentified object.
The balloon was moving against the wind in a northeast direction, which is unusual for a conventional balloon.
Multiple individuals on board the vessel observed the unusual balloon.
The balloon was reported to be very large and moving at a high speed.
White smoke was seen underneath the balloon, adding to the mysterious nature of the sighting.
sighted object: very large balloon with white smoke
witnesses: civilian from a vessel and several others on board
